title: view(-1)
body_html:
I installed the source version of pytorch from github (0.5.0a0+580556d) and I noticed that view(-1) doesn't always flatten a tensor. It seems to work on and off. A could not really deduce a pattern when it does work and when it doesn't.

Update: calling contiguous() seems to have solved the problem. I think you can close this issue.

body:
I installed the source version of pytorch from github (0.5.0a0+580556d) and I noticed that view(-1) doesn't always flatten a tensor. It seems to work on and off. A could not really deduce a pattern when it does work and when it doesn't. 

Update: calling contiguous() seems to have solved the problem. I think you can close this issue.
